import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import "./analyticalReports.css"; import Click from "../analyticalreportclick/click"; import { useState, useEffect, useRef} from "react"; function AnalyticalReports() { const [showdiv, setShowDiv] = useState([false, false, false, false, false, false, false, false, false, false, false]); const toggle = (index) => { const updateddivs = [...showdiv]; updateddivs[index] = !updateddivs[index]; setShowDiv(updateddivs); }; const popupRef = useRef(null); const closePopup = (e) => { if (popupRef.current && !popupRef.current.contains(e.target)) { const updateddivs = [...showdiv]; updateddivs[0] = false; // Close the popup by setting the showdiv[0] to false setShowDiv(updateddivs); } }; // Add a click event listener to the document useEffect(() => { document.addEventListener("click", closePopup); // Clean up the event listener when the component unmounts return () => { document.removeEventListener("click", closePopup); }; }, []); return (

 ); } export default AnalyticalReports;
